Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label two different habitats, one on land and one in water.
The student can draw and label at least three different types of plants in each habitat, showing variety.
The student can draw and label at least three different types of animals in each habitat, showing variety.
The student can compare and show the differences in types of plants and animals between the two habitats.
The student can observe and illustrate patterns in the types of plants and animals in each habitat, such as showing groups of similar organisms.
